Package imagingbook.lib.image

Class ImageAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.image.ImageAccessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImageAccessor.Rgb, ImageAccessor.Scalar
    public abstract class ImageAccessor
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides unified image access to all 4 types of images available in ImageJ. Byte, Short, Float: get/set values are passed as type float using getVal() and setVal(). Byte, Short, Float, Rgb: uses a float[] to pass in values using getPix() and setPix(). getVal() and getPix() interpolate for non-integer coordinates.
    Version:
    2015/12/20

      • create

        public static ImageAccessor create​(ij.process.ImageProcessor ip,
                                   OutOfBoundsStrategy obs,
                                   InterpolationMethod ipm)
        Creates a new ImageAccessor instance for the given image, using the specified out-of-bounds strategy and interpolation method.
        Parameters:
        ip - the source image
        obs - the out-of-bounds strategy (use null for default settings)
        ipm - the interpolation method (use null for default settings)
        Returns:
        a new ImageAccessor instance
